info.title: National API - Port API
info.description:
PortAPI is a rest full API for Finnish ports to send statistics data over to Nemo for Maritime statistics purpose and to request data for traffic taking place in Finnish ports. The National API now uses MIG 1.0.0.0 and 2.0.0.0 versions. The API access and documentation will be shared by Fintraffic and is not publicly available compared to National Declarant API. Each request to the API must be authenticated with a JWT token. The token must be obtained from the IDP (Identity Provider) using the client credentials flow.
How to get JWT token for port organization ```bash curl -X POST 'https:///realms/nemo/protocol/openid-connect/token' \ -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' \ -d 'client_id=' \ -d 'client_secret=' \ -d 'grant_type=client_credentials' ``` IDP - DEV: mnsw-dev.mnsw.fi/keycloak \ IDP - TST: mnsw-tst.mnsw.fi/keycloak \ IDP - STG: mnsw-stg.mnsw.fi/keycloak \ IDP - PRD: mnsw.mnsw.fi/keycloak Example request with CURL: ```bash curl --request GET 'https://mnsw-dev.mnsw.fi/port-api/v1/ports/data?endDate=2025-08-22&startDate=2025-08-01' \ --header 'Authorization: Bearer ' ```

tags.name: Ports
tags.description:
The national port API will enable ports to send statistics data over to Nemo for Maritime statistics purpose and to request data for traffic taking place in Finnish ports.
The API access and documentation will be shared by Fintraffic and is not publicly available compared to national declarant API.
Ports should have the following formalities available and the data they have: 
ATA, ATD, CGA, CGD, COA, CWA, CWD, HZA, HZD, MDH, MTS, NOA, NOD, PXA, PXD, SEC, SRV, VID, WAR and WAS

tags.name: Ships
tags.description: Port authorities can search and get ship information.

post.description: Send statistics data for its own port to Nemo for Maritime statistics purposes.

400.description: Invalid request, statistics cannot be sent. Check the request body values

error:1.description: portCallInformation must contain one of the following identifiers: imoNumber, cfrNumber, eniNumber, mmsiNumber, callSign or otherId.

403.description: Statistics can't be send due to lack of permissions

get.summary: Get list of all ship data including certificates
get.description: Get Ship, SID, SHP and certificate data. Search by ship name, IMO number, call sign, cfr number, eni number, MMSI number or other unique ID.

parameters.name: cfrId
parameters.description: Community Fleet Register Number (EU fishing ships).

parameters.name: eniId
parameters.description: European Number of Identification for inland ships.

parameters.name: otherId
parameters.description: Another unique ID if no IMO/MMSI are assigned.

200.description: A list of ship data (ESD, exemptions, ship certificates).

400.description: Invalid request, ship data cannot be retrieved

403.description: Ship data can't be get due to lack of permissions

get.description: Search by ESD ID, ship name, imo number, mmsi number or call sign

authority.authorityName: The Finnish Transport and Communications Agency

400.description: Invalid request, ship data cannot be retrieved if the request parameter is missing

403.description: Ship identifiers data can't be get due to lack of permissions

get.description:
Request port formalities data for traffic taking place in Finnish ports.
If necessary, data can be queried for the desired period.
 Returns all saved formalities from the following formalities: ATA, ATD, CGA, CGD, COA, CWA, CWD, HZA, HZD, MDH, MTS, NOA, NOD, PXA, PXD, SEC, SRV, VID, WAR and WAS

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Searching by eta, where the date starts with the value of startDate. Format in YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Searching by eta, where the date ends with the value of endDate. Format in YYYY-MM-DD

400.description: Invalid request, port data cannot be retrieved

value.errorMessage: End date cannot be before start date

403.description: Port data can't be get due to lack of permissions

404.description: Information not found. The information you were trying to access could not be found, please try to select some other information
